name: Louis XIII
description:
King name: Louis XIII
Reign:  1610 –1643
Country : France
.
In the time of Louis XIII, France was one of the most important powers in Europe, owed to the services of his Chancellor, Cardinal Richelieu, nicknamed His Excellency the Reds. He reduced the power of local rulers and greatly weakened feudal rule. He also organized the army and suppressed Protestant rebels. With his death and the arrival of Cardinal Mazaren as Chancellor, the chaos of France spread for a while.
